title: Reuters reveals Argentina central bank pauses rate hikes after inflation undershoot
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively reported Argentina’s central bank board was set to keep the benchmark interest rate steady at 75% as September […]

The post Reuters reveals Argentina central bank pauses rate hikes after inflation undershoot appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported Argentina’s central bank board was set to keep the benchmark interest rate steady at 75% as September inflation data came in lower than expected. The bank confirmed the news on Tuesday. The decision to hold the rate unchanged breaks one of the worldâ€™s most aggressive tightening cycles in the inflation-hit South American country where prices are set to rise around 100% this year.

The post Reuters reveals Argentina central bank pauses rate hikes after inflation undershoot appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
